text: Ra phira'aunaka natedaramadhye e'uta momin vyakti jasale aphno imana luka'era rakhthyo bhannathalyo ‘‘ke timile e'uta manisala'i yasa karana marna cahanchau, ki usale bhancha ki mero palanakarta allaha ho, ra usale timro pasama timro palanakartako tarphabata pramanaharu pani li'era a'eko cha? Ra yadi tyo jhutha cha bhane usako jhuthako noksana usaila'i hunecha. Ra yadi satya cha bhane juna sajayako usale timila'i dhamki di'irakheko cha, tyasabata kehi na kehi ta timimathi a'iparnecha. Niscaya nai allahale tyastala'i marga dekha'umdaina jo atikramanakari ra bado jhutha chan
